capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry's lineage is indeed pure-blood wizarding heritage. I've always found it interesting that he was born to James and Lily Potter, two of the most iconic wizards in British history. capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm a huge fan of Professor McGonagall. I mean, she's an amazing witch and an incredible role model for any young witch or wizard. Her lineage is indeed pure-blood, and that's something to be proud of. But what I admire most about her is the way she balances her magical heritage with her strong sense of justice and compassion.
